duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage outside plant, inside plant cable, and Small Cell Network (SCN) construction projects with a focus on local and state permitting, and pole and conduit licensing procedures.
Attend and contribute to project kick-off meetings, vendor selection, and Bid processes.
Develop customer relationships, influence customers to award service work to the company, and manage material procurement.
Provide oversight and direction to general contractors, manage project equipment and material, and ensure accurate project tracking.
Develop a working knowledge of permitting and licensing process and ensure the awareness of issues that impact project completion or cost.
Observe and learn from Network Construction Managers, Fiber Engineers, and Customers to drive successful project completion.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent required, valid driver’s license required
